title: ohevan.com
description: My personal blog. I write about programming, notes, reviews for techs and more. Built with hexo blog framework, hosted on Vercel, using my own theme, "hexo-theme-redefine".

body.raw:
Built with [Hexo](https://hexo.io/) blog framework, hosted on [Vercel](https://vercel.com/).

Theme: [hexo-theme-redefine](https://github.com/EvanNotFound/hexo-theme-redefine)

![ohevan.com](https://evan.beee.top/img/12cecd44dfa4dc58777bd8aad05b68d3-fa397.png)

![](https://evan.beee.top/img/9ce48d14cabd2a4fbe98926aeb2d35a2-19132.png)
